scripts.build: mkdir -p build && browserify -p esmify --full-paths ui/browser.js > build/bundle-ui.js && node write-dist.js
scripts.release: mkdir -p build && browserify -g uglifyify -p esmify ui/browser.js > build/bundle-ui.js && node write-dist.js
scripts.inline: mkdir -p build && browserify -g uglifyify -p esmify ui/browser.js > build/bundle-ui.js && node write-dist.js && node node_modules/inline-source-cli/dist/index.js --compress false --attribute '' --root dist/ dist/index.html dist/index-inlined.html && sed -i -e "s~assets/noavatar.svg~data:image/svg+xml;base64,$(base64 -w 0 assets/noavatar.svg)~" dist/index-inlined.html && pushd dist && find . \! -name 'index-inlined.html' \! -name 'favicon.ico' -delete && mv index-inlined.html index.html && popd
